home.title: What's Your Mental Age?
home.subtitle: Answer fun questions and share results with friends!
home.ageInput: First, tell us your real age

teen.title: Forever Teen ğŸ§’
teen.description: You still lowkey wish mom would make dinner for you! Your innocence is your superpower. But maybe it's time to adult a little...

young_adult.title: Hot 20s ğŸ˜
young_adult.description: You yell YOLO but still put money in savings! Walking the tightrope between passion and reality~

adult.title: Real Adult ğŸ’¼
adult.description: Waking up saying 'ugh... another day...' instead of 'let's gooo!' You've officially adulted!

mature.title: Life Expert ğŸ§
mature.description: You have that 'I've seen it all' look on your face! And secretly proud when younger folks ask for advice~

wise.title: Wise One ğŸ§™
wise.description: You've discovered the truth of life! 'Kids these days don't know anything...' just comes out automatically, right?

q1.text: Your friend asks 'Why don't you use emojis?' How do you respond?

options.c: Haha that's just how I am

q2.text: It's weekend morning. You wake up at 7am. What do you do?

options.a: This is insane! Back to sleep immediately ğŸ’¤
options.b: Oh I'm up early~ Time for YouTube
options.c: Nice, let's go for a morning workout
options.d: Early bird gets the worm! â˜€ï¸

q3.text: You found an old friend on social media. What do you do?

options.c: Just peek at their profile and move on
options.d: Social media? I'm fine with just texting

options.b: Money is king. Gotta be realistic
options.c: Health first. Can't do anything without it
options.d: Family and peaceful daily life is happiness

q5.text: How do you deal with stress?

options.a: Gaming all night or binge-watching shows ğŸ®
options.b: Call up friends for drinks ğŸº
options.c: Me time. Walk or cafe alone
options.d: Just endure it. Sleep it off

q6.text: A new app just came out! Your reaction?

options.a: Download immediately! Don't even know what it is ğŸ¤³
options.b: Let me check the reviews first
options.c: I'll get it if I need it
options.d: Another new app? I can barely use what I have...

options.a: Spicy! Or that new restaurant! ğŸ”¥
options.b: What am I craving? Opens delivery app
options.d: Home cooking is best. Gotta eat healthy

q8.text: At a party with strangers, you...

options.a: Initiate convo! Let's make friends ğŸ™‹
options.b: Talk if they talk to me first
options.c: Just stick with people I know

options.d: Fun stuff? I just like living normally

q10.text: It's 10pm. What are you usually doing?

options.a: The day is just getting started! ğŸŒ™
options.c: Getting sleepy... shower and bed prep

q11.text: Video call vs Text/DM. Your preference?

options.a: Video call! I like seeing faces ğŸ“¹

q12.text: Suddenly you get a week off! You...

options.a: Book a trip immediately! Where to? âœˆï¸
options.d: Time to catch up on house chores

q13.text: When you encounter new slang or trends?

options.a: Obviously know it! Already using it lol
options.d: What are kids saying these days...

q14.text: When you regret a decision, your attitude is...

options.a: Why did I do that... can't stop thinking ğŸ˜¢
options.c: It was the best choice at the time. It's fine
options.d: Regret changes nothing. Just do better next time

q15.text: Someone asks 'What are you learning these days?'

options.d: At my age? I've learned enough
